Recommendation.name: Recommendation
Recommendation.description: Represents the recommendations surfaced as offers and actions for Einstein Next Best Action.

AcceptanceLabel.description: Label that appears as the accept option on the surfaced recommendation. Maximum size is 80 characters.

ActionReference.description: Flow referenced for this recommendation. Label is Action.

Description.description: Text description of the recommendation. Maximum size is 255 characters.

ExternalId.description: Stores an identifier for the recommendation source, such as product, so Einstein can group all responses for a given recommendation.

ImageId.description: Image referenced by this recommendation. Label is Image.

IsActionActive.description: Indicates whether the flow referenced in the Action field is active (true) or not (false). Read only.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the recommendation was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the recommendation was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the recommendation. Maximum size is 80 characters.

NetworkId.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site associated with the recommendation (if applicable).

RecommendationKey.description: Track responses to a recommendation when it doesnâ€™t have an ID. Maximum size is 255 characters.

RejectionLabel.description: Label that appears as the reject option on the surfaced recommendation. Maximum size is 80 characters.
